```{python}
#| label: fig-mash-third-order
#| fig-cap: "Block diagram of a 3rd-order MASH 1-1-1 delta-sigma modulator with three cascaded first-order stages and digital noise cancellation logic including dither injection."
#| echo: false
import schemdraw as sd
import schemdraw.elements as elm
import schemdraw.dsp as dsp

sd.svgconfig.svg2 = False

with sd.Drawing(canvas='svg') as d:
    d.config(unit=2, fontsize=14)
    
    def integ():
        _sum = dsp.Sum()
        elm.Line().right(d.unit*3/4)
        d.push()
        elm.Line().down(d.unit)
        elm.Arrow().left(d.unit/4)
        dsp.Square().label(r'$z^{-1}$').left()
        elm.Line().left().tox(_sum.S)
        elm.Arrow().up().to(_sum.S)
        d.pop()
        return _sum

    elm.Arrow().right(d.unit/2).label(r'$F$', 'left')
    sum0 = dsp.Sum().color('blue')
    d.push()
    elm.Arrow().down(d.unit/2).at(sum0.S).reverse().color('blue')
    dsp.Square().label('dither').color('blue')
    d.pop()


    elm.Arrow().right(d.unit/2)

    sum1 = integ()
    elm.Arrow().right(d.unit/2).idot()
    sum2 = integ()
    elm.Arrow().right(d.unit/2).idot()
    sum3 = integ()

    elm.Arrow().up(d.unit/2).at(sum1.N).label('carry')
    sum4 = dsp.Sum().up()

    elm.Arrow().up(d.unit/2).at(sum2.N).label('carry')
    sum5 = dsp.Sum().up()

    elm.Line().up(d.unit*3/4).at(sum3.N).label('carry')
    elm.Line().left(d.unit/2).dot()
    d.push()
    elm.Arrow().to(sum5.S)
    d.pop()

    elm.Line().up(d.unit)
    elm.Arrow().left(d.unit/4)
    dsp.Square().label(r'$z^{-1}$').left()
    elm.Line().left().tox(sum5.E)
    elm.Arrow().to(sum5.E).label('--')

    elm.Line().left(d.unit/2).dot().at(sum5.N)
    d.push()
    elm.Arrow().to(sum4.S)
    d.pop()

    elm.Line().up(d.unit)
    elm.Arrow().left(d.unit/4)
    dsp.Square().label(r'$z^{-1}$').left()
    elm.Line().left().tox(sum4.E)
    elm.Arrow().to(sum4.E).label('--')

    elm.Line().left(d.unit/2).at(sum4.N)
    elm.Arrow().up(d.unit*1.5)
    sum6 = dsp.Sum().drop('S')
    elm.Arrow().right(d.unit).label(r'$N + \Delta N$', 'right')
    elm.Arrow().left(d.unit*3/4).at(sum6.N).reverse().label(r'$N$', 'left')
```
